# iosxr_router_igmp_vrf_interface (Data Source)

This data source can read the Router IGMP VRF Interface configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_router_igmp_vrf_interface" "example" {
  vrf_name       = "VRF1"
  interface_name = "GigabitEthernet0/0/0/1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `interface_name` (String) Select an interface to configure
- `vrf_name` (String) VRF configs

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `access_group` (String) IGMP group access group
- `dvmrp_enable` (Boolean) Configure dvmrp to allow dvmrp processing on all interfaces
- `explicit_tracking_acl` (String) Access list specifying tracking group range
- `explicit_tracking_disable` (Boolean) Disable IGMPv3 explicit host tracking
- `explicit_tracking_enable` (Boolean) Disable IGMPv3 explicit host tracking
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `join_groups` (Attributes List) IGMP join multicast group (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--join_groups))
- `maximum_groups_per_interface` (Number) Maxinum number of groups accepted per interface by this router
- `maximum_groups_per_interface_acl` (String) Name of ACL
- `maximum_groups_per_interface_threshold` (Number) Threshold warning
- `query_interval` (Number) IGMP host query interval
- `query_max_response_time` (Number) IGMP max query response value
- `query_timeout` (Number) IGMP previous querier timeout
- `router_disable` (Boolean) Disable Router side functionality in IGMP
- `router_enable` (Boolean) Enable Router side functionality in IGMP
- `static_groups` (Attributes List) IGMP static multicast group (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--static_groups))
- `version` (Number) IGMP version

<a id="nestedatt--join_groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `join_groups`

Read-Only:

- `group_address` (String) IP group address
- `group_address_only` (Boolean) Join multicast group without source address
- `source_addresses` (Attributes List) Source address to include or exclude (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--join_groups--source_addresses))

<a id="nestedatt--join_groups--source_addresses"></a>
### Nested Schema for `join_groups.source_addresses`

Read-Only:

- `exclude` (Boolean) Exclude only the following source address
- `include` (Boolean) Include only the following source address
- `source_ip` (String) Source address to include



<a id="nestedatt--static_groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `static_groups`

Read-Only:

- `group_address` (String) IP group address
- `group_address_only` (Boolean) Group-address without increment mask/source-address
- `group_masks` (Attributes List) Increment mask for group address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--static_groups--group_masks))
- `group_masks_source_addresses` (Attributes List) Increment mask for group address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--static_groups--group_masks_source_addresses))
- `source_addresses` (Attributes List) IGMP static multicast group (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--static_groups--source_addresses))
- `suppress_reports` (Boolean) Suppress IGMP reports

<a id="nestedatt--static_groups--group_masks"></a>
### Nested Schema for `static_groups.group_masks`

Read-Only:

- `group_count` (Number) No. of group addresses to join
- `group_inc_mask` (String) Increment mask for group address
- `suppress_reports` (Boolean) Suppress IGMP reports


<a id="nestedatt--static_groups--group_masks_source_addresses"></a>
### Nested Schema for `static_groups.group_masks_source_addresses`

Read-Only:

- `group_count` (Number) No. of group addresses to join
- `group_inc_mask` (String) Increment mask for group address
- `source_ip` (String) Source address to join
- `suppress_reports` (Boolean) Suppress IGMP reports


<a id="nestedatt--static_groups--source_addresses"></a>
### Nested Schema for `static_groups.source_addresses`

Read-Only:

- `source_ip` (String) Source address to join
- `suppress_reports` (Boolean) Suppress IGMP reports
